channel.title: Comments on: Connection Cloud
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
Hi,
I hope you can help in my search for a program that will allow me to determine how many connection of friends stand between two random people who have never met.
My idea is to demonstrate to businesses how powerful the social graph is in the world of marketing. A business would use their email address or facebook username together with their facebook friends as the first point of reference. We will then take the email address or facebook username of a customer and calculate how many friends lists would have been required to reach that customer using social media.
I am aware that the API allows you to do all sorts of things and wonder if this level of functionality is possible.
Please advise.
Thanks Chris
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I hope you can help in my search for a program that will allow me to determine how many connection of friends stand between two random people who have never met.

My idea is to demonstrate to businesses how powerful the social graph is in the world of marketing. A business would use their email address or facebook username together with their facebook friends as the first point of reference. We will then take the email address or facebook username of a customer and calculate how many friends lists would have been required to reach that customer using social media.

I am aware that the API allows you to do all sorts of things and wonder if this level of functionality is possible.

Please advise.

Thanks
Chris

item.title: By: Max
item.dc:creator: Max
item.description:
Hi,
Is there some problem actually with connection cloud ?
Loading Facebook Data (scroll down to see progress)...
Fatal error: Cannot use string offset as an array in /home/theacho2/public_html/facebook/connection/saveData.php on line 27
It's a great application !
Thanks
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Is there some problem actually with connection cloud ?

Loading Facebook Data (scroll down to see progress)…

Fatal error: Cannot use string offset as an array in /home/theacho2/public_html/facebook/connection/saveData.php on line 27

It’s a great application !

Thanks

item.title: By: coldclimate
item.dc:creator: coldclimate
item.description: Hi, I really like the look and feel of your graphs - if the engine available for reuse? I'm trying to build software to visulise clouds of the music.
item.content:encoded:
Hi,
I really like the look and feel of your graphs – if the engine available for reuse? I’m trying to build software to visulise clouds of the music.

item.title: By: Ferah
item.dc:creator: Ferah
item.description: Hi. It is a really good application. But I couldn't find myself anywhere in the graph. Touchgraph seems weaker than yours.
item.content:encoded: Hi. It is a really good application. But I couldn’t find myself anywhere in the graph. Touchgraph seems weaker than yours.

item.title: By: Jonas
item.dc:creator: Jonas
item.description: I've been looking for an app which kan tell you the closest connection between two facebook users who aren't friends. Is this something you could implement or is it at all possible?
item.content:encoded: I’ve been looking for an app which kan tell you the closest connection between two facebook users who aren’t friends. Is this something you could implement or is it at all possible?
